name: Web3 Token Gate
author: W3P

sections.description:
Web3 Token Gate is an innovative Web3 authentication plugin for WordPress. Web3 Token Gate allows users to show hidden content only to those that verify they own a specific Ethereum NFT in their cryptocurrency wallet. Web3 Token Gate authenticates the user and checks ownership of their crypto wallet. Use this plugin to create exclusive content for any Ethereum NFT collection.

Currently Web3 Token Gate works only with ERC 721 standard NFTs. Users must verify ownership using a MetaMask wallet.

Web3 Token Gate allows you to set two separate custom responses. Upon successful verification users will receive a message with the hidden content. If the users cannot verify ownership they will receive a second failed verification message.

Web3 Token Gate

Use Cases

Token Gated Content: Restrict a message on your website based on the NFT collection in a MetaMask wallet. Make it mandatory for users to buy specific NFT collections to access the restricted content.

Failed Verification: Link the users to famous NFT marketplaces like OpenSea, Rarible, and Mintable for purchasing NFT collections or give custom messages.

Supported Networks

Ethereum Mainnet (ERC 721 NFTs)
Polygon (Matic) ERC 721 & ERC 1155 – Pro Only

Faqs

If you have a question. Please take a look at Web3 Token Gate FAQs

Privacy

Web3 Token Gate plugin does not store any wallet addresses or user information for complete privacy.

Web3 Token Gate Pro

More Content: Restrict specific content, pages, posts, and videos on your WordPress website.
Multiple Shortcodes: Multiple shortcodes for gated content with multiple NFT contracts.
Multiple Wallets: MetaMask, WalletConnect, Coinbase, TrustWallet + more.
Multiple Blockchains: Ethereum, Polygon (Matic), Binance Smart Chain + more.
Caching: Turn on caching for WooCommerce pages and additional use cases.
ERC 1155 Support: Add verification based on ERC 1155 NFTs.
sections.installation:
Upload the Web3 Token Gate folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory or alternatively upload the web3-token-gate.zip file via the plugin page of WordPress by clicking ‘Add New’ and selecting the zip from your computer.

Install and activate the Web3 Token Gate WordPress plugin.
Activate the Web3 Token Gate WordPress plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
Click the ‘Settings” link on the Web3 Token Gate plugin on the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress to set up your NFT contract address and response messages.
Use the provided shortcodes to add the Web3 Token Gate functionality to any WordPress page.
sections.changelog:
For more information, visit W3P.

1.0.7 (18 Apr 2024)

  • New: Added caching support (PRO).
  • New: Added support for ERC 1155 NFT (PRO).

1.0.6 (20 Dec 2023)

  • New: Restrict content by token number.
  • New: Implement automatic caching.
  • Fix: Bugs

1.0.5 (24 July 2023)

  • Dev: Update freemius SDK

1.0.4 (17 Oct 2022)

  • Fix: Incorrect Label in verification form.

1.0.3 (16 Oct 2022)

  • New: Hide the activate wallet button on success.
  • New (Premium Feature): Add an option to explicitly define success output types.

1.0.2 (10 Oct 2022)

  • Fix: Use SSL Encrypted API

1.0.1 (3 Oct 2022)

  • New: Go Pro link in the plugin menu.
  • New: Added Affiliation form in the plugin.
  • Fix: Duplicate Gate connection issue.

1.0.0 (29 Sep 2022)

  • New: Initial Release.
